Class SsmlBuilder

This class helps simplify creating SSML (Speech Synthesis Markup Language) using the builder pattern. This only supports a subset of SSML tags that Cortana devices support.

Inheritance

Syntax
public class SsmlBuilder
Examples
var speech = new SSMLBuilder().Say("Hello, world!").BreakByDuration("1s").Say("My name is Joe.").ToString();

Methods

| Improve this Doc View Source

BreakByDuration(String)

Creates and appends a <break> tag into the <speak> tag that will pause the audio based upon the duration provided. This method will also ensure the break duration conforms to the duration restrictions.

See https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/cortana/reference/ssml#break-element

Declaration
public SsmlBuilder BreakByDuration(string duration)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.String duration

The duration represented by a number + either 's' for second or 'ms' for milliseconds.
Returns
Type Description
SsmlBuilder

Returns this SSMLBuilder instance.
| Improve this Doc View Source

BreakByStrength(BreakStrengthOptions)

Creates and appends a <break> tag into the <speak> tag that will pause the audio based upon the strength provided.

See https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/cortana/reference/ssml#break-element

Declaration
public SsmlBuilder BreakByStrength(BreakStrengthOptions strength)

SayAs(String, InterpretAsOptions, String)

Creates and appends a <say-as> tag into the <speak> tag that has multiple attributes such as interpret-as and format.

See https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/cortana/reference/ssml#say-as-element

Declaration
public SsmlBuilder SayAs(string text, InterpretAsOptions interpret, string format = "")
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.String text

The raw text to be interpreted.
InterpretAsOptions interpret

The interpret-as attribute that indicates the content type of text contained in the element.
System.String format

The format attribute that provides additional information about the precise formatting of the text contained in the element.
Returns
Type Description
SsmlBuilder

Returns this SSMLBuilder instance.
